Package jibe.sdk.client.apptoapp

Contains classes and packages related to Jibe App2App

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AppToAppDatabaseConstants A class that defines constants for the app-to-app databases.
AppToAppDatabaseConstants.Columns Column definitions for the database tables that are used to hold information on the app-to-app capabilities of the user's contacts.
AppToAppDatabaseConstants.Columns.JibeUserApps Definitions for the 'Jibe User Apps' table.
AppToAppDatabaseConstants.Columns.JibeUsers Definitions for the 'Jibe Users' table.
AppToAppDatabaseConstants.Columns.MyApps Definitions for the 'My Apps' table.
AppToAppDatabaseConstants.Tables Definitions of the tables inside the app-to-app database.
AppToAppEvent A JibeEvent class, used to keep the user informed of changes of app-to-app status.
Config A class representing the app-to-app configuration.
 

Package jibe.sdk.client.apptoapp Description

Contains classes and packages related to Jibe App2App
